name: LightBall (Epyxx Studios)
description:
Shoot Balls and Change colour

You must hit the enemy balls with the same color

Avoid the enemy balls to hit you or your base

How to Play:

1.  Shoot by clicking anything or the player

2. Change color, hit the enemy by shooting with same colour 

3. Rotate, press the rotate icon to rotate Faster

How to Install:

1. Click Download.

2. Check if google chrome is installing the apk

3. Allow the google chrome to install the apk

4. After installing from google chrome find the apk from storage of your phone

5. Click APK to install the Game.

6. Destroy Balls

Known Bugs

Player might stop rotating at some point, it might rotate again or maybe not
